MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown today to safely carry out repairs and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:36am on Friday, 12 March 2021.
